term.title: alkene photocycloaddition

item.text: Photochemical process leading to formation of a cyclobutane upon addition of an electronically excited alkene to another ground-state alkene or of an electronically excited α,β-unsaturated carbonyl compound to a ground-state alkene. The latter is called a de Mayo reaction.

notes.item: A special case of photocycloaddition is a photodimerization.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 301 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
